attributes.action: Remove Pakistan from redlist.its infection rate is low and vaccination rate high
attributes.background: We want the Government to remove Pakistan from redlist

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974

If you choose to start a new petition in future, please make sure you include your full name as we can't accept petitions which are started using just a first name.
